trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Clearwater
There was one other sighting in Clearwater on or around July 27th 2009
divs: sighting detailsobject was almost the intensity of venus, but reddish\orange. traveling southeast just a little faster than an airplane. then the object became just as bright ...if not brighter than venus, almost like a fireball,then the object started traveling upwards as the light rapidly dimmed away. several minutes later (approx 10min),if happened again with an object traveling from direct west. going direct east, ending with the same result.
Summary: 2 bright reddish lights appeared near clearwater florida at 2 different times shoot out into space
